name: Mlibrary.GitHub.io
body:
### This is the front page for the University of Michigan Library's GitHub organization

Welcome!

Members of the U-M Library's GitHub organization can access the [private wiki](https://github.com/mlibrary/mlibdocs/wiki). Others can browse the list of our [public repositories](https://github.com/mlibrary/).

### Joining the U-M Library GitHub organization

The [U-M Library GitHub organization](https://github.com/mlibrary) is managed by [Core Services](mailto:lit-cs-sysadmin@umich.edu).  Library staff can request to be added to the organization.  When doing so, please include your GitHub account name.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
